languages.text: The Gods of Chaos are monstrous beings weaved from mortal obsessions and fears. These ancient entities of unimaginable power and infinite malice endlessly seek to burst into realspace and lay ruin to it and its inhabitants.
languages.original_text: Хаос воплощают вредоносные сущности, называемые Богами Хаоса, и связанные с ними демоны. Этим термином также называют смертных, присягнувших искажающим силам Хаоса.

traits.locale_text: Chaos is embodied by the malevolent entities called Chaos Gods and their respective daemons. The term also encompasses those mortals who have thrown in their lot with the corrupting forces of Chaos.
Chaos is embodied by the malevolent entities called Chaos Gods and their respective daemons. The term also encompasses those mortals who have thrown in their lot with the corrupting forces of Chaos.

The Gods of Chaos are monstrous beings weaved from mortal obsessions and fears. These ancient entities of unimaginable power and infinite malice endlessly seek to burst into realspace and lay ruin to it and its inhabitants.

languages.text: Хаос воплощают вредоносные сущности, называемые Богами Хаоса, и связанные с ними демоны. Этим термином также называют смертных, присягнувших искажающим силам Хаоса.

Die Götter des Chaos sind monströse Wesen, die aus den Besessenheiten und Ängsten der Sterblichen gewoben wurden. Diese uralten Wesen von unvorstellbarer Macht und unendlicher Bosheit versuchen immer wieder, in den Realraum einzudringen und ihn und seine Bewohner ins Verderben zu stürzen.
languages.original_text: The Gods of Chaos are monstrous beings weaved from mortal obsessions and fears. These ancient entities of unimaginable power and infinite malice endlessly seek to burst into realspace and lay ruin to it and its inhabitants.

traits.locale_text: Die Götter des Chaos sind monströse Wesen, die aus den Besessenheiten und Ängsten der Sterblichen gewoben wurden. Diese uralten Wesen von unvorstellbarer Macht und unendlicher Bosheit versuchen immer wieder, in den Realraum einzudringen und ihn und seine Bewohner ins Verderben zu stürzen.

languages.text: Les Dieux du Chaos sont des êtres monstrueux issus des obsessions et des peurs des mortels. Ces anciennes entités d'une puissance inimaginable et d'une malveillance infinie cherchent sans cesse à faire irruption dans l'espace réel pour y semer le chaos.
languages.original_text: The Gods of Chaos are monstrous beings weaved from mortal obsessions and fears. These ancient entities of unimaginable power and infinite malice endlessly seek to burst into realspace and lay ruin to it and its inhabitants.

traits.locale_text: Les Dieux du Chaos sont des êtres monstrueux issus des obsessions et des peurs des mortels. Ces anciennes entités d'une puissance inimaginable et d'une malice infinie cherchent sans cesse à faire irruption dans l'espace réel pour y semer le chaos.

languages.text: 混沌诸神是由一切生物的执念与恐惧编制而成的怪物。这些古老的实体拥有难以想象的力量与无尽的恶意。他们会无休止地渴望闯入真实世界，消灭真实世界的居民。
languages.original_text: The Gods of Chaos are monstrous beings weaved from mortal obsessions and fears. These ancient entities of unimaginable power and infinite malice endlessly seek to burst into realspace and lay ruin to it and its inhabitants.

traits.locale_text: 混沌诸神是由一切生物的执念与恐惧编制而成的怪物。这些古老的实体拥有难以想象的力量与无尽的恶意。他们会无休止地渴望闯入真实世界，消灭真实世界的居民。

languages.text: 渾沌（ケイオス）の神々は、人間の強迫観念と恐怖から編み出された怪物的存在である。想像を絶するパワーと無限の悪意を持つこの古代の存在は、果てしなくリアルスペースに侵入し、リアルスペースとその住人を破滅させようとしている。
languages.original_text: The Gods of Chaos are monstrous beings weaved from mortal obsessions and fears. These ancient entities of unimaginable power and infinite malice endlessly seek to burst into realspace and lay ruin to it and its inhabitants.

traits.locale_text: 渾沌（ケイオス）の神々は、人間の強迫観念と恐怖から編み出された怪物的存在である。想像を絶するパワーと無限の悪意を持つこの古代の存在は、果てしなくリアルスペースに侵入し、リアルスペースとその住人を破滅させようとしている。

languages.text: Los Dioses del Caos son seres monstruosos nacidos de los miedos y las obsesiones de los mortales. Estas entidades antiguas de poder inimaginable y maldad infinita anhelan llegar al espacio real y causarles la ruina a sus habitantes.
languages.original_text: The Gods of Chaos are monstrous beings weaved from mortal obsessions and fears. These ancient entities of unimaginable power and infinite malice endlessly seek to burst into realspace and lay ruin to it and its inhabitants.

traits.locale_text: Los Dioses del Caos son seres monstruosos nacidos de los miedos y las obsesiones de los mortales. Estas entidades antiguas de poder inimaginable y maldad infinita anhelan llegar al espacio real y causarles la ruina a sus habitantes.

languages.text: Kaos Tanrıları, fâni saplantı ve korkulardan vücut bulmuş canavarımsı varlıklardır. Akıl almaz güce ve sınırsız kötülüğe sahip bu kadim varlıklar, dur durak bilmeden gerçekuzaya girmenin ve orayı ve sakinlerini mahvetmenin yollarını aramaktadır.
languages.original_text: The Gods of Chaos are monstrous beings weaved from mortal obsessions and fears. These ancient entities of unimaginable power and infinite malice endlessly seek to burst into realspace and lay ruin to it and its inhabitants.
